liquidity_page_hero_content: Become a Liquidity Provider on PancakeSwap and get extra rewards! 1,000,000 HI will be distributed to liquidity providers who add to the HI/BUSD Pair on PancakeSwap, and then stake those LP tokens on hi. Liquidity providers will gain rewards based on their percentage share of the overall liquidity pool, with 1 million HI split between all staked liquidity providers.
liquidity_page_hero_title: Bonus 1 Million HI Liquidity Provider Rewards Program
liquidity_page_title_1:
Program Starting: 14th October 2021
Duration: 3 Months
Liquidity Pool: HI/BUSD
Total Rewards: 1,000,000 HI
DEX: PancakeSwap
Platform: Binance Smart Chain
liquidity_Page_title_3_content_3: STEP 3Earn rewards based on your percentage share of the overall liquidity pool. To earn extra rewards, do not un-stake your LP tokens within 30 days.
liquidity_Page_title_3_content_2: STEP 2Stake your Liquidity Provider tokens of HI/BUSD on this webpage.
liquidity_Page_title_3_content_1: STEP 1Go to PancakeSwap and provide liquidity on the HI/BUSD pair at a 50:50 ratio.
liquidity_Page_title_3_content_4: STEP 4Once the Rewards Program is complete or you choose to remove your stake, you may un-stake your LP tokens and claim your rewards.
liquidity_Page_header_subtitle:
Please add liquidity to the PancakeSwap HI-BUSD pool and deposit the LP token received here to mine more HI.
Please refer to the guide for more details.
liquidity_Page_header_title: Beta - use at your own risk.
liquidity_page_title_4_content_1:
Stake your LP tokens from providing liquidity in the HI/BUSD pair on Pancakeswap and be eligible for additional rewards from the bonus pool of 1 million HI.
Liquidity Providers gain rewards based on their percentage share of the overall liquidity pool.
mobile_liquidity_Page_title_5_content_1:
Install the MetaMask plugin and
use Chrome on your desktop for
the best experience.
mobile_liquidity_page_hero_content:
Become a Liquidity Provider on PancakeSwap and get extra rewards!
1,000,000 HI will be distributed to liquidity
providers who add to the HI/BUSD Pair on
PancakeSwap, and then stake those LP tokens
on hi. Liquidity providers will gain rewards based
on their percentage share of the overall liquidity
pool, with 1 million HI split between all staked
liquidity providers.
mobile_liquidity_page_hero_title:
Bonus 1 Million HI
Liquidity Provider
Rewards Program
mobile_liquidity_Page_title_3_content_1: STEP 1Go to PancakeSwap and provide liquidity on the HI/BUSD pair at a 50:50 ratio.
mobile_liquidity_Page_title_3_content_3: STEP 3Earn rewards based on your percentage share of the overall liquidity pool. To earn extra rewards,do not un-stake your LP tokens within 30 days.
mobile_liquidity_Page_title_3_content_2: STEP 2Stake your Liquidity Provider tokens of HI/BUSD on this webpage.
mobile_liquidity_Page_title_3_content_4: STEP 4Once the Rewards Program is complete or you choose to remove your stake, you may un-stake your LP tokens and claim your rewards.
mobile_liquidity_page_title_4_content_1:

providing liquidity in the HI/BUSD
pair on Pancakeswap and be

liquidity_page_title_4_?_8: The overall number of Liquidity Provider tokens deposited by all participants.
liquidity_page_title_4_?_7: The overall amount of HI to be Rewarded for the Program duration.
liquidity_page_title_4_?_5: HI you have Earned in Rewards to date that is now available for withdrawal.
liquidity_page_title_4_?_3: The total amount of HI you have Earned via the Liquidity Provider Rewards Program.
liquidity_page_title_4_?_2: The total amount of Liquidity Provider Tokens (HI/BUSD) you have deposited into the Liquidity Provider Rewards Program.
liquidity_page_title_4_?_1: Annual Percentage Yield (APY) is the estimated yearly yield for tokens deposited in the Liquidity Provider Rewards Program.
liquidity_page_title_4_?_6: HI that you have already Claimed as Rewards as part of the Liquidity Provider Program.
